      • getDesignationByDesignationName

        public org.egov.pims.commons.Designation getDesignationByDesignationName(String designationName)
                                                                  throws org.egov.commons.exception.NoSuchObjectException
        All comparisons are done after converting to uppercase.
        Parameters:
        designationName -
        Returns:
        Designation master object if a unique one was found for the input designationName, or null otherwise.
        Throws:
        org.egov.commons.exception.NoSuchObjectException - ,the input to this exception method is key i.e., defined in application resources please make sure you are using this key and displaying appropriate messages to client.
